Invited Experts

We're thankful for every invited guest--presenter, workshop leader, or panelist--that has contributed to Science & Us events. Learn more about their careers and feel free to contact us to get in touch with them. Especially if you're a Science & Us alum or community member, this is your network!

Ainara Sistiaga, Marie Curie Postdoctoral Fellow at MIT
Alyson Warr, Ph.D. Student at Harvard Medical School
Athanasios Athanassiadis, Ph.D. Candidate at MIT Mechanical Engineering & Communication Lab
Daina Bouquin, Space Librarian at Harvard-Smithsonian Center for Astrophysics
Dana Boebinger, Ph.D. Student at Harvard Medical School
Fatima Husain, Curiosity Correspondent and Science Writer at MIT
Florcy Romero, Curriculum Developer and Community Liaison at pgEd in Harvard Medical School
Gabriela Serrato Marks, Ph.D. Candidate at MIT-WHOI Joint Program
Jeffery DelViscio, Multimedia Journalist at STAT News
Karen Weintraub, Freelance Science Journalist
Kelsey Tysowsski, Ph.D. Student at Harvard Medical School
Marc Abrahams, Editor, Founder and Master of Ceremonies at Annals of Improbable Research, Ig Nobel Prize Ceremony
Mariah Tinger, Author, Professor, Sustainability Consultant at Boston University
Mary O'Reilly, Freelance Science Illustrator at O'Reilly Science Art
Meg Rosenburg, Freelance Writer, Editor, and Filmmaker
Paul Berkman, Director at Science Diplomacy Center at Tufts University
Wade Roush, Freelance Journalist and Audio Producer
Wei Sun Leong, Postdoctoral Scholar at MIT Electrical Engineering & Computer Science
